name: Shapocalypse
description:
SHAPOCALYPES playfully incorporates the use of your surroundings to be used as projectiles against the 'shapeheads' as you try to dominate the whole map by destroying their spawn towers. (environmentally friendly)

Programmed by Joshua Legaspi -> https://www.instagram.com/jiyoshu/

Art direction was created by Kelly Bull ->http://kellysketches.com/

Required: Xbox 360 Controllers or Xbox One Controller

Website: http://shapocalypse.webflow.io/ (Images needs updating)
